data.prayer: Spirit, give the disciples of the the state of Surkhandarya words, actions, signs and wonders to proclaim the coming of the Kingdom.
data.verse: As you go, proclaim this message: "The kingdom of heaven has come near."

data.location_label: Photo from the state of Surkhandarya, Uzbekistan
data.section_summary: What people or activities could you pray for in this photo?

data.prayer: Father, we suspect there is 1 believer for every 557 neighbors who are far from you in Surkhandarya. Please, give courage and opportunity to your children to speak boldly.
data.verse: Pray also for me, that whenever I speak, words may be given me so that I will fearlessly make known the mystery of the gospel.

data.label_1: One disciple of Jesus for every 557 lost neighbors

data.prayer: Jesus, please bless the leaders of the the state of Surkhandarya, Uzbekistan who work hard at shepherding and guiding your people.
data.verse: With upright heart he shepherded them and guided them with his skillful hand.

data.prayer: Holy Spirit, have mercy on the simple who turned from you in the state of Surkhandarya. Warn them again against their complacency.
data.verse: For the simple are killed by their turning away, and the complacency of fools destroys them;

data.prayer: Spirit, I pray that the Pashtun, Northern people will come and worship before you, Lord. May they glorify your name for you are great.
Jesus, help the local leaders in Surkhandarya, Uzbekistan not be proud but humble, and willing to wash the feet of all they serve.
data.verse: “You call me ‘Teacher’ and ‘Lord,’ and rightly so, for that is what I am. Now that I, your Lord and Teacher, have washed your feet, you also should wash one another’s feet. I have set you an example that you should do as I have done for you.

data.prayer: Father, help media producers communicate the gospel in a way that is understandable to the people of Surkhandarya, Uzbekistan.
data.verse: But from there, you will seek the LORD your God, and you will find Him if you search for Him with all your heart and all your soul.

data.section_summary:
the state of Surkhandarya, Uzbekistan has a population of 321,400.

We estimate Surkhandarya has 576 people who might know Jesus, 6,901 people who might know about Jesus culturally, and 313,923 people who do not know Jesus.

This is 1 believer for every 557 neighbors who need Jesus.

data.prayer: Father, be a refuge and strength for the hurting in Surkhandarya, Uzbekistan today.
data.verse: God is our refuge and strength, an ever-present help in trouble.
